subject: Sailboats and Sailing
Boats and Boating
Ships and Shipping
lead_paragraph: The injured French sailor Yann Elies has been rescued from his yacht by an Australian Navy ship. Elies broke his leg Thursday while working on the deck of his yacht Generali during the Vendée Globe round-the-world race. The race Web site said Elies was picked up by the frigate Arunta on Saturday, after it sailed 800 miles from Australia’s west coast.
